message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I believe you'll find very valuable.  I'm asking for $14,000.  I think it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring to your business.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate the value it brings. However, I can only afford to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope this revised offer works for you.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and be a worthwhile investment for you.
I understand your perspective, Alice. Thank you for adjusting your offer. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $12,500 for the product.
